meanings.definition: A new or recent thing or situation.
meanings.sent1: I saw a shiny noo toy in the store.
meanings.sent2: The noo student in class seems shy.
meanings.sent3: The noo puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a burst of noo sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The noo car gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To make new or fresh again.
meanings.sent1: She wanted to noo her room with bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The rain helped noo the dry plants in the garden.
meanings.sent3: He tried to noo his old shoes with new laces.
meanings.sent4: The music seemed to noo his tired spirit.
meanings.sent5: The chef used fresh herbs to noo the dish.

meanings.sent1: A nap can noo your energy levels.
meanings.sent2: The cool breeze helped noo her after a long walk.
meanings.sent3: Laughter can noo the mood in a room.
meanings.sent4: His kind words noo her confidence.
meanings.sent5: The rain seemed to noo the thirsty plants.
